description.value: ValueSet IMMZD2DTPolioBOPVPlusIPV for IMMZ.D2.DT.Polio.bOPV plus IPV. Business rule: Determine if the client is due for a poliovirus vaccination according to the national immunization schedule Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any Table: "Bivalent oral polio vaccine (bOPV) plus inactivated polio vaccine (IPV)" schedule (applicable for all countries)
